QuestData.Title: Insurrection: Crafting War
QuestData.Description: Refugees are flooding in to Shal'Aran, and many are willing to fight for Thalyssra's rebel army.$b$bThey need weapons, training and help from anyone who can provide it.$b$bGo to Shal'Aran and lend your assistance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with First Arcanist Thalyssra in Shal'Aran.
